backend/main.mo: Defines a backend actor that stores contact form submissions and exposes a submitContactForm method to add new entries with timestamps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports describing implemented features, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for major frontend files including App, components, hooks, utilities, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base, component, and utility layers with extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring branding, favicon, metadata, and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React page rendering the hero section with logo and credibility line, navigation buttons, and service details with smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Implements a validated contact form with success/error states and backend submission via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor instance based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state.
React Query mutation hook sending contact form data to the backend and invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes plus global utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind and conditional class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, animations, typography, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, image needs, and feature definitions for the marketing site build.
